amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that U.S. troops will be able to serve under a military commander of NATO, in a NATO operation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to create an exemption from the prohibition against U.S. troops being placed under foreign command. The amendment would permit U.S. troops to serve under the command of officers from NATO countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
